author: Special Correspondent
text:
N. Sivakumar (50), a mason, was murdered allegedly by his son-in-law R. Vinod (29), involved in textiles sale, in the former’s house at Kothampatti near Jambunathapuram on Wednesday.

Police said Sivakumar was quarrelling with his wife reportedly under the influence of alcohol. Vinod, who came inside the house, intervened leading to a wordy quarrel between them. Sivakumar, who allegedly had an ‘aruval,’ was said to have rushed towards Vinod. First, Vinod picked up a grindstone and threw it on Sivakumar. He also snatched the aruval from Sivakumar and attacked him killing him on the spot. Police inspected the scene of crime and conducted inquiries. On a complaint from Sivakumar’s wife S. Kannagi, the police arrested Vinod and booked a murder case.
title: Man kills father-in-law
